help: This is a telegram bot to help you map your relationship. Use /add and /remove to modify your relationship. You can always youse 'I' or 'me' in place of your own name.
error_add: Sorry, I couldn't parse your message. Try '/add <name> + <name> = <relationship>'
error_remove: Sorry, I couldn't parse your message. Try '/remove <name>, <name>'
error_show: Sorry, I couldn't find any relationships
